text:
Communications that have anger and areas where it feels threatening or unsafe I am flagging. The restraining order will cover and will be shared with
your lawyer shortly.
If emergencies, at this time, I have the kids so nothing should be needed.
Message 679 of 4024
Whoa!!! Stop. Let’s talk as planned please.
I don’t want to fight. I just asked if you could show me that you have full custody. I am not going to fight you. I am happy with our parenting plan
and planning for Dr Brown. Let’s please talk
Sent:01/23/2024 at 11:09 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 11:39 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Basketball today
Message 680 of 4024
I finally got in
Christ... I’m reading what you wrote. Christine. Please don’t blow up. What on earth did I do? I agreed with everything you asked below. We also
agreed (and chatted once already) that Dr Brown for AD is important enough to address today. It’s the way we started this thread.
And the only question I had, I specifically said I would “pause” not fight. Not escalate. Pause. What else can I do to not be confrontational with you
other than to ask to stop that discussion if it made you mad or we just disagreed. That’s what pause means. Literally.
Why are you escalating, making threats, and refusing what you have already agreed is an urgent enough issue to talk immediately. I said I would pause
Christine. I did not escalate or do anything that should cause you to feel unsafe.
Please re-read what I said. I don’t want to fight. Why are you escalating when I asked to stop the discussion and work on the most immediate plan? I
really don’t get how asking you to stop a discussion we have a different pov on is worth an escalation.
Why are you doing this?
Sent:01/23/2024 at 11:44 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 11:46 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Basketball today
Message 681 of 4024
May you please reply? I know you have seen this.
You know I did everything in my power to stop the sensitive topic and you know we have to discuss AD.
Can you please let me know how to proceed without escalation and getting the courts involved now?
Sent:01/23/2024 at 12:15 PM
From:Robert Moyer
